sources.title: Officer Thirteen
sources.description: A motorcycle cop quits the force to bring his partner's killer to justice, because the corrput legal system will not.

metadata.Plot: A motorcycle policeman's partner is deliberately run off the road and killed by a member of a syndicate that controls the gambling--and much of the justice system--in his town. When the killer is freed because of perjured testimony and the corrupt legal system, the dead officer's partner quits the force and vows to bring the killer to justice.
metadata.Actors: Monte Blue, Lila Lee, Charles Delaney
